description: Try our easy to follow Triple Chocolate & Caramel Brownies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Triple Chocolate & Caramel Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160°C. Grease a 20x30cm slice pan and line base and sides with baking paper.

Melt butter and dark chocolate in a heatproof bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water, ensuring the base of the bowl doesn’t touch the water, stirring frequently until melted and smooth. Set aside.

In a separate bowl, whisk eggs and sugar together until pale. Stir through chocolate mixture. Sift flour and cocoa over mixture and fold through until combined. Stir through chopped milk and white chocolates and pour into pan.

Whisk caramel in a small bowl with milk to loosen. Add dollops randomly over brownie then use a skewer to swirl through chocolate mixture. Bake for 18-20 minutes then cool in tray for 1 hour. Refrigerate or cut and serve.
